title: HTML Fundamentals
description: Learn HTML structure, tags, forms, semantic elements, and accessibility basics.

title: CSS Basics & Layout
description: Understand CSS selectors, box model, flexbox, grid, and responsive layouts.

title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Learn variables, functions, loops, DOM manipulation, and basic logic.

title: React Essentials
description: Learn components, props, state management, and building reusable UI.

title: Mini Project
description: Build a small portfolio project applying all learned concepts.
